amendment.description: To authorize a land conveyance of Air Force property, La Junta, Colorado.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1355 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1355 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12498) To authorize a land conveyance of Air Force property, La Junta, Colorado.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1355 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1355 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
